title: Nicodemus National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes         Annual Pass 2014 NPS Photo  There is no fee to Nicodemus National Historic Site. The site does not sell the America the Beautiful: The National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass Series, but you may purchase the card in Kansas at one of the below sites: Cimarron National Grassland - Elkhart, KS 620-697-4621 http://www.fs.fed.us/r2/psicc/cim Great Plains Nature Center - Wichita, KS 316-683-5499 http://www.gpnc.org Quivira National Wildlife Refuge - Stafford, KS 620-486-2393 http://www.fws.gov/refuge/quivira/ or online at http://store.usgs.gov/pass    Â     Activie Military Pass 2014 NPS Photo
